content:
# FACTORY REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at (-9.5, 72.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, 72.5)
- Boiler at position (-5.0, 75.5)
- Steam engine at position (0.5, 79.5)
- Pipe network connecting these components
- Small electric poles distributing power

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing at (18.5, 73.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at position (18.5, 73.5)
- Wooden chest at position (18.5, 75.5) collecting iron ore
- Burner inserter at position (19.5, 75.5) moving ore from chest to belt
- Transport belt system from position (20.5, 75.5) to (26.5, 76.5)
- Two stone furnaces at positions (22.0, 79.0) and (26.0, 79.0)
- Input inserters at positions (22.5, 77.5) and (26.5, 77.5)
- Output inserters at positions (22.5, 80.5) and (26.5, 80.5)
- Output belt system from position (22.5, 81.5) to (26.5, 81.5)
- Wooden chest at position (28.5, 81.5) collecting iron plates
- Inserter at position (27.5, 81.5) moving plates to the collection chest

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting entities
- Transport belts cannot be connected directly from a chest as a source; use an inserter between the chest and belt
- Ensure the path is valid when connecting transport belts; belts must form a continuous line

### Errors when placing entities in occupied spaces
- Check if a position is already occupied before placing an entity
- Remove existing entities before placing new ones at the same position

### Errors related to player position
- Move closer to the target location before placing entities; maximum placement distance is 10 units
- Use move_to() function to navigate to the desired location before placing entities

### Errors with inserter placement
- Ensure the drop position of an inserter is not already occupied by another entity
- When placing an inserter next to an entity, check that the target position is free

### Function name errors
- Use move_to() instead of move() for player movement
- Double-check function names to ensure they match the available API
